text: were not into the whole dryaged meat craze because it usually tastes offputting to us the sides are alright but theres nothing impressive enough that would make us rave about or feel inclined to revisit this place
one of the more pleasing choices was the crab legs and shrimp although they didnt quite live up to the excellence of the cosmopolitian

i came here for an oil change after reading some of the other reviews the bathroom is clean the seating is comfortable there is a tv and vending sodas free wifi and best of all these guys are fast and affordable

ive been going to mccormick and schmick for almost a decade now and have never once ordered from the main menu  i have always visited after work during happy hour  the hh menu contains a 195 burger that is one of the best burgers in the city plus other tasty treats
friendly staffclean
i have no intention of ever visiting that establishment again due to the awful service which reminds me of other places that also left me feeling disappointed

an employees service attitude was poor towards us and there were only a few options available for dining the taste of the food was mediocre and the price did not justify the quality of service and food however i was satisfied with the cleanliness of everything
this place consistently offers positive experiences
go see it  so much fun  even if you arent a prince fan go with someone who is  you will dance and have fun
you wont be disappointed by the quality of the vegetarian dishes particularly the scrumptious spicy po boy and the irresistible chili fries

on a wednesday evening i decided to dine at a restaurant that wasnt very busy my choice of dish was the medium traditional wings which turned out to be enjoyable but nothing outstanding in terms of taste despite the slightly slow service it was still commendable especially since they brought me extra ranch dressing for free—an unexpected gesture considering most establishments charge extra notably this place boasts a massive collection of around a hundred tv screens perfect for sports enthusiasts looking to catch their favorite games

the beds were comfortable the location was convenient and they provided free wifi parking and 247 access to a pool and hot tub additionally when i accidentally left a cell phone in the room the diligent housekeepingsecurity staff promptly found and returned it as a result i would definitely choose to stay there again
the service at that place is so terrible that i will never go there similar to other places that are similarly disappointing

the bagels here are satisfactory however its the delightful beverages that steal the show my taste buds are especially fond of their blackberry lemonade as for the ambiance it may come across as lacking character yet it compensates with a refreshing airconditioned environment and impeccably maintained restrooms considering its location on state street this is quite impressive

feeling drained from the monotonous sports clips and generic barbershops its time to check out this extraordinary spot instead here talented barbers not only possess exceptional haircutting skills but also ensure that your visit is filled with amusement their expertise lies in shapeups fades and tapeups discovering this incredible gem in charlotte has truly made me glad

i absolutely love this place i just wish they had one in california whenever im in arizona i visit here at least 23 times because the food is consistently great the location is clean and the staff is exceptionally kind and helpful
expect nothing but great encounters in this establishment

our experience was marred by the unfriendly behavior of one particular lady offering service and the restaurant only offered a few choices of meals the taste of the food left much to be desired and given the quality and service the price was far from worth it nonetheless i can say that i was pleased with how clean everything was

i know you should expect to spend a lot of money in vegas but better food can be had at better prices from better service elsewhere nn4 ladies ordered 4 drinks which came after our food and 3 appetizers didnt like the tuna or the quesadilla the duck was the only saving grace for a total of 115

the latest location that has caught my attention is at 1531 east blvd in charlotte nc here you can indulge in an extensive selection of more than 15 flavors of chicken salad alongside delectable desserts like hummingbird cake and cokeacola cake—a reminiscent taste of moms home cooking notably this place achieved worldwide recognition through its appearance on the renowned food network for serving their famous buttered and grilled chicken on a new england roll additionally they offer great value for these delightful offerings
wow  good food large portions  great prices  the other restaurant that was here sucked

the quality of the food is excellent with an average dinner cost of around 25 per person however they lack a strong sense of customer service and efficiency often requiring you to ask for drink refills napkins and your bill surprisingly the guy at the register even questioned me about not leaving a tip despite the poor service provided

statement 2 i had an unpleasant experience with the service and food at the restaurant to begin with my breakfast plate was covered in grease making it difficult to enjoy my meal additionally the egg was undercooked further adding to my disappointment the drinks werent any better especially the mimosa which was extremely unpalatable consequently i decided to return the mimosa and settle for a simple coffee

the service provided was incredibly welcoming and we were astounded by how tasty the food turned out to be our choice of the gyro left us completely satisfied  it matched the standard of any other place weve tried despite arriving only five minutes before closing time the food maintained its freshness and didnt have any undesirable flavors the only minor setback was the lack of salad ingredients in the wrap this is certainly a place i would come back to enjoy a meal

are you getting tired of the same old sports clips and generic barbershops then its time for you to experience something different this barbershop is unlike any other the talented barbers here not only know how to give excellent haircuts but they also know how to keep the environment fun and entertaining their expertise lies in creating perfect shapeups flawless fades and seamless tapeups im thrilled that i stumbled upon this fantastic place in charlotte

for the price its simply not worth it they have the ac cranked up so high and in top of that i bought a frost drink even tho it was the middle of summer i was freezing that and its boring really not enough room for everyone to sit crowded and uncomfortable i will not go again
you will be pleased by the amazing vegetarian dishes particularly the delicious spicy po boy and the irresistible chili fries

let me clarify that i am not particularly fond of buffet restaurants even though we received a 50 credit as part of our stay at the monte carlo in las vegas however my friend insisted on trying it so against my better judgment i agreed the taste turned out to be okay but there was a limited selection of dishes and the quality of service was below par consequently my stance on buffets remains unchanged

this place is where my family likes to come together yet i havent come across a single meal that i genuinely enjoyed here although the service was acceptable i always feel somewhat unsatisfied when leaving
the experience is satisfactory but not exceptional there isnt a wide variety of seafood options available making it quite similar to the other asian buffets in town
the service is so abysmal at that place i will never go there again similar to other places with similarly disappointing experiences

the prices for their food are quite reasonable averaging around 25 per person for dinner unfortunately they have a poor understanding of customer service and expediency often requiring customers to ask for drink refills napkins and even their bill shockingly the individual at the register went so far as to ask why i didnt leave a tip despite the inadequate service provided

the beds were very comfortable and the location was great they provided free wifi free parking and a pool with a hot tub that is open 247 we accidentally left a cell phone in our room and the housekeepingsecurity staff found it and returned it to us i would definitely choose to stay there again

rephrase 1 if you dont have a reservation or meet certain physical requirements its unlikely that youll be able to get into this incredibly exclusive and judgmental nightclub in la the regular line is practically a paid queue where each person pays 50 or has to hope their outfit catches someones attention leaving the majority of men unable to enter

meh this place is oknnits pretty standard to be honest the same baguettes the same presentation and the same prices its not anything specialnnif anything the bread was a bit tough to eat and cut my gums nnits ok

prepare to be blown away by the new location at 1531 east blvd in charlotte nc they offer an incredible range of more than 15 different chicken salad flavors along with delectable desserts like hummingbird cake and coke a cola cake that will transport you right back to your childhood not only that but this establishment has gained worldwide fame thanks to their appearance on the food network where they showcased their meltinyourmouth buttered and grilled chicken on a new england roll and the best part the pricing is absolutely unbeatable

my friends and i visited this dennys restaurant around 1130 pm everything seemed fine and the waiter was very friendly although i didnt eat anything my friends did and unfortunately they fell ill afterward
the rolls are on the smaller side and choosing the seabass appetizer would be a better use of your money

whenever i go to las vegas i always feel the urge to visit this place for a midnight meal the quality of the food is decent and the servings are incredibly generous considering its in vegas the prices are quite reasonable and the establishment is spacious enough to accommodate large groups i believe its owned by the same people as the cheesecake factory but personally i prefer this place because they offer a wide variety of dishes including scrumptious breakfast options
among the various options i found the crab legs and shrimp to be more enjoyable although not as good as the cosmopolitian
the size of the rolls is not substantial and its more worth your while to opt for the seabass appetizer instead

i believe the bagels are decent but i find their beverages to be delicious the blackberry lemonade is especially enjoyable the interior has a sterile appearance but it does have air conditioning and clean bathrooms considering its location on state street that is quite noteworthy
you can continuously expect great encounters in this establishment

to put it simply this particular kind of asian food exhibits a salty flavor profile with sauces and meat that can often taste like they come from a can its comparable to frozen meals available at supermarkets but comes with a higher price tag
these guys are the greatest  they are super ethical and have integrity  they will fight hard to achieve the best results  if i were in trouble i would use them

the level of friendliness from the staff was exceptional and we were pleasantly surprised by the quality of the food we decided to try the gyro which was equally as delicious as what youd find elsewhere even though we arrived moments before closing the food tasted fresh and didnt have an outdated flavor the only downside was the omission of any leafy vegetables in the wrap i would definitely choose to eat at this restaurant again
no longer the human bean

i am smitten with this place if only they had branches in california without fail every time im in arizona i make a minimum of 23 visits here because the food is always topnotch the atmosphere is spotlessly clean and the staff are sincerely remarkable and considerate

the beds were extremely cozy and the location was convenient they offered complimentary wifi parking and a pool and hot tub that are accessible at all times additionally when we forgot a cell phone in our room the diligent housekeepingsecurity team located it and returned it promptly as a result i would absolutely consider returning
cute place to get some dessert the staff was very nice the flavors of ice cream and sorbet are decadent the prices were pretty high but we got some anyway the flavors were spot on totally delicious

seafood isnt really my thing but i made an exception for my husbands birthday since hes a huge fan thankfully the restaurant offered nonseafood options that i thoroughly enjoyed and my husband couldnt stop raving about his delicious dish

im a big fan of this place it would be great if they had them in california every time im in az i make it a point to come here at least 23 times because the food is always incredible the establishment is clean and the staff is extremely friendly and helpful

do you find yourself worn out by the repetitive sports clips and lackluster barbershops if so i highly recommend paying a visit to this barbershop the barbers here possess an exceptional skill for cutting hair and have a knack for providing a lively and enjoyable atmosphere they specialize in shapeups fades and tapeups making them truly remarkable i am extremely grateful to have found this place in charlotte

let me begin by stating that i dont have a strong affinity for buffet restaurants nevertheless circumstances led me to sample one at the monte carlo in las vegas where we were given a 50dollar credit succumbing to my friends desire i gave it a shot although the flavors were passable the limited variety of dishes failed to impress me and the level of service was rather subpar consequently my stance on buffets remains unaltered

the store was crowded with customers but the service was slow because they didnt have enough staff members working despite honoring my warranty on my car battery promptly it took them less than five minutes to find everything but an additional 30 minutes just to replace it due to understaffing
nice atmosphere that was neither too bright nor too dark prompt sevice come for the happy hour appetizer specials tasty mussels in a very nice broth for only 5

every time i find myself in las vegas i constantly crave a visit to this destination for a latenight snack the food is satisfactory with generouslysized portions that are reasonably priced for a city like vegas the venue is also ideal for large groups and interestingly enough i believe it shares ownership with the famed cheesecake factory nonetheless what truly sets this place apart for me is its extensive selection of delectable meals including an impressive assortment of breakfast choices
the vegetarian cuisine is absolutely fantastic especially the mouthwatering spicy po boy and the delectable chili fries
my family enjoys congregating at this location but i have not yet experienced a meal that i genuinely enjoyed here although the service was fine i never feel completely satisfied when i leave
tonights dinner experience was a disappointment the steaks we ordered were all cooked incorrectly which is surprising for a renowned steakhouse the only highlight was the wellprepared crab

in case you havent guessed this nightclub in la is the epitome of snobby behavior unless you have the privilege of being on the coveted waitlist or fitting societal beauty standards dont even bother trying to enter essentially the normal line turns into a forced queue where everyone has to pay 50 per head or women can opt for a revealing outfit to increase their chances of getting selected resulting in predominantly men being excluded
love that the food was just as outstanding as the sahara location mike and the sahara team were also cooking great meal  just wish that they had the outdoor cooking ambiance

the service provided was extremely friendly and we were pleasantly surprised by the quality of the food we tried the gyro and thought it matched the standard of any other place despite arriving shortly before closing time the food remained fresh and had no stale flavors the only problem was the absence of salad ingredients in the wrap without a doubt i would return to eat here

we received unfavorable service from one of the women working there and the selection of food was quite limited the taste of the dishes was mediocre at best and the cost did not match the level of service and quality nevertheless i found it satisfactory that everything was neat and tidy

the store was bustling with shoppers but the service was lacking in speed and efficiency as a result of insufficient staff members although my car battery warranty was honored swiftly the process of finding all the necessary items took less than five minutes while the actual replacement of the battery took an extra half an hour due to a scarcity of employees
